page.title: 18DANCING CLASS
page.content: On a Saturday morning at 9.00 am. I go to a dancing class. We do Ballet, Tap-dancing and Disco dancing. Ballet is a form of moving the legs and arms into different positions. Tap Dancing is a jolly sort of way to dance and you have special shoes which have steel studs of the tip of the toes and heels. Disco dancing is dancing to modern pop music and you can break dance which is sliding around on your back or your head. The dancing class is at St John's church in Heath Hayes in the room at the back. It is a small room with a changing room where you can get changed. By Joanne Hinton.Age 10yrs.
